next one day of sales data. Deﬁning the inputs and outputs of the model forces you to think
about what exactly is or may be required to make a forecast. You may not be able to be speciﬁc
when it comes to input data. For example, you may not know whether one or multiple prior
time steps are required to make a forecast. But you will be able to identify the variables that
could be used to make a forecast.
What are the inputs and outputs for a forecast?
